derivation: from a compound of G5259 (ὑπωπιάζω) and a derivative of G3700 (ὑπωπιάζω);
strongs_def: to hit under the eye (buffet or disable an antagonist as a pugilist), i.e. (figuratively) to tease or annoy (into compliance), subdue (one's passions)
outline:
1. to beat black and blue, to smite so as to cause bruises and livid spots
    1. like a boxer one buffets his body, handle it roughly, discipline by hardships
  2. metaph.
    1. to give one intolerable annoyance
      1. beat one out, wear one out
    2. by entreaties
  3. that part of the face that is under the eyes
